Uses of Class
ZuulBad.Item

  • Uses of Item in ZuulBad

    Subclasses of Item in ZuulBad 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Accessory
    This class is responsible for items of the game which the player cannot store or move.
    class  Food
    This class is responsible for food items in the game
    class  Valuable
    This class is responsible for valuable items in the game
    class  Weapon
    This class is responsible for weapon items in the game.
    Fields in ZuulBad with type parameters of type Item 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<Item> Items.itemlist
    ArrayList that can be used to store items
    Methods in ZuulBad that return Item 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Item Environment.getItem​(java.lang.String itemName)
    Getter for an item available in this game.
    Item Items.getItem​(java.lang.String itemName)
    Takes wanted item out of the item list and returns it
    Methods in ZuulBad with parameters of type Item 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Items.addItem​(Item item)
    Adds specific item to the item list
    void Room.addItem​(Item... items)
    Add items to the item list.
    void Inventory.addItemToBackpack​(Item... items)
    One or more items are put into the backpack.
    boolean Player.backpackContainsItem​(Item specificitem)
    Answers the question if the player's backpack contains a specific item or not.
    boolean Inventory.contains​(Item specificitem)
    Answers the question if a specified item is in the backpack or not.
    boolean Items.contains​(Item item)
    Checks if an item is in the item list
    boolean Room.containsItem​(Item specificitem)
    Checks if the specified item is in the room.
    boolean Player.putItemIntoBackpack​(Item item)
    An item is put into the player's backpack provided that it does not exceed the backpacks capacity (maxWeight).
    boolean Inventory.removeItem​(Item item)
    An item is removed from the backpack.
    void Items.removeItem​(Item item)
    Removes item from the item list
    void Room.removeItem​(Item item)  
    boolean Player.removeItemFromBackpack​(Item item)
    The player removes an item of his/her backpack.
